title.rendered: GIFS – The IIG Information Systems& Technology Program

content.rendered:
CRITERIA / REQUIREMENTS


● IT Graduates in the Insurance / Finance Sector
● Employed in the Insurance / Finance Industry
● Able to travel to Sandton, Jhb
● Clear credit & criminal records.
● Good English comprehension skills
● Able to commit to the 12-month program
● Adhoc training sessions for employed staff

Cost: Non IIG Members = R8 000
IIG Members = R5 000

Apply via the link: https://forms.gle/N7SYXy5AFLrzuLb78

Application deadline: Wednesday, 19 June 2024
